steps.title: Collect the four quarters around the room.
steps.content: Collect the four quarters around the room. Click Phred to buy his whistle. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Once you have the whistle, click it to play it.
steps.content: Once you have the whistle, click it to play it. You will knock out the teacher and will be able to leave the room. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Go out to the hallway and then into Mrs.
steps.content: Go out to the hallway and then into Mrs. Sleep's room. Click the open desk to get sliding oil and 30 cents. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Go out, go right, and then click on the first locker at the right side.
steps.content: Go out, go right, and then click on the first locker at the right side. You will get a dime.

steps.title: Go right again.
steps.content: Go right again. Click on the "slidy" to reveal a toilet paper roll inside the vent. Click the toilet paper roll to get it.

steps.title: Go left and then into the Men's Room.
steps.content: Go left and then into the Men's Room. Click the toilet paper that you found earlier to give it to the person inside the stall. Then grab the mop inside the stall. Go out. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Go left and into the Janitor's room.
steps.content: Go left and into the Janitor's room. Click on the mop when you get in. Be sure to do it before you click on the talk bubble. He will give you a dime.

steps.title: Visit the teacher's lounge and choose any speech bubble.
steps.content: Visit the teacher's lounge and choose any speech bubble. Finish the dialogue and you will be sent out of the room. Then go to Mr. Sum's room and you will find him there.

steps.title: Click on the notes on Mr.
steps.content: Click on the notes on Mr. Sum's desk to find a quarter. Collect it and revisit the teacher's lounge. Then click at the back of the cookie machine.

steps.title: Plug in the wire next.
steps.content: Plug in the wire next. Click the cookie machine to buy a cookie. Leave the Teacher's Lounge and click the cookie to give it to Chubb. He will fall over, granting you access to the office. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Go into the office and then go into Mr.
steps.content: Go into the office and then go into Mr. Mister's office. Watch the cutscene and then go all the way left to the exit at the end of the hall. Open the door and you are free. You have completed the game!
